issues.info: You may report issues with the mod in the AvalancheIndex repository.

badge-profile.name: Badge On Profiles
badge-profile.description: Display member badges on the <cg>profile page</c>.

comments.name: Comment Text Color
comments.description: Customize the text color for team members' comments.

solo-cells.name: Solo Level Cells
solo-cells.description: Highlight level cells for <co>team members' solo levels</c>.

solo-layers.name: Solo Level Pages
solo-layers.description: Customize level pages for <co>team members' solo levels</c>.

classic-only.name: Only Classic Levels
classic-only.description: Display highlight color exclusively on <cg>classic</c> <cy>solo levels</c>.

colors.name: Comment Colors
colors.description: Set the colors that comment text from <cl>Avalanche</c> will be recolored to. <cr>This ignores the publisher of the level being commented on.</c>

com-director.name: Director Color
com-director.description: Customize the comment color for the <cy>director</c>.

com-manager.name: Manager Color
com-manager.description: Customize the comment color for the <cy>managers</c>.

com-member.name: Member Color
com-member.description: Customize the comment color for the <cy>members</c>.

com-collaborator.name: Collaborator Color
com-collaborator.description: Customize the comment color for the <cy>collaborators</c>.

com-cubic.name: Cubic Studios Color
com-cubic.description: Customize the comment color for the <cj>Cubic Studios</c> <cy>staff</c>.

show-aval-featured.name: Show Featured Project Button
show-aval-featured.description: Display a button in the main menu that shows the featured <cl>Avalanche</c> <cy>team project</c>.

err-notifs.name: Web Error Notifications
err-notifs.description: Display a notification when the badge web request fails.

web-once.name: Check Badges Once
web-once.description: Only send one web request to check a user's badge, instead of checking as much as the rate limit supports.

check-aval.name: Frequent Checks For New Project
check-aval.description: Ping the server more often to check for a new featured <cl>Avalanche</c> <cy>team project</c>.
check-aval.enable-if-description: The Featured Project button must be enabled to use this setting.
